website_summaries.verdict: If you prefer traditional eyeliners that are soft and easy to smudge for smoky looks, this one lives up to its name.
pros: Classic pencil that twists up, so no sharpening is required
Glides on effortlessly and can be smudged for softer lines
A good choice for consumers who like a smoky eye look
Colors are vivid and last for hours
cons: Not the best pick for creating dramatic, precisely defined lines or wings
More likely to smear and transfer than others on our shortlist

customer_reviews.title: FAKE- do not buy!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This product that was sold to me is not an authentic Stila eyeliner. I compared it to my current Stila Smudge Stick that I bought from Sephora and if you look at the pictures I took,you can see they are totally different. (real one has the stars, fake one does not, different font and words,etc)
customer_reviews.author: Janine minerva

customer_reviews.title: Irritated Red Eyes!
customer_reviews.text: First use and this product made my eyes red, swollen, and crusted! I’ve never had this happen to my eyes before so just FYI!
customer_reviews.author: Kayla Edwards

customer_reviews.title: Decent Liner
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a brown eye liner for the bottom lid that didn't smudge or melt down into the eye pad area. This is not it. I like the fact that there are a variety of colors and the color I chose was Spice which is a nice darker brown. Product glides on nice and smooth but I would have thought for waterproof it would not smudge under the eye and it does. Comes off relatively easy.
customer_reviews.author: Lostie in Chicago

customer_reviews.title: I love this product
customer_reviews.text: I am a 14 year makeup artist and I suggest doing a waterproof liner as a tight line all the time. I personally struggle with smudging. Stila waterproof liner is the only eyeliner I’ve found that actually stays on my eyes without smudging or making a mess. I love this product.
customer_reviews.author: Sean Joseph O'Donnell

customer_reviews.title: Arrived with broken tip, couldn't advance the stick to get more
customer_reviews.text: I should have paid more attention to the reviews where customers noted that the stick has problems. That's what happened to me. The Stila arrived in a box, and when I took off the top, the tip was broken off, so I tried to advance the stick to get more. It wouldn't turn, no matter how I tried. There was a small bit of the gel still available, so I tried that. Not exactly waterproof as it was gone about 4 or 5 hours later. No remover needed. My drugstore cheapo lasts longer.
customer_reviews.author: MH

customer_reviews.title: Best Stick Liner!
customer_reviews.text: I'm a big fan of Stila eyeliner. If you've never used this eyeliner before, I recommend giving it a try. It works great for upper lids and for lining the lower ones. Although liquid liner tends to provide the easiest application for upper lids in my experience, I like this one because it doesn't crease, goes on smoothly, and lasts a long time. I'm a RN and I often work super long shifts so I demand a lot from my makeup, especially my eyeliner. This is one of the few brands that will still look good after 12-16 hours with only minimal touch up. Additionally, I wear contacts and it doesn't bother my eyes as many brands do.
customer_reviews.author: Nurse BexTop Contributor: Activewear

customer_reviews.title: Love This Eye Liner
customer_reviews.text: This is the first eye liner that I really enjoy using. It's soft enough to easily apply and smudge out into a smoky eye, but then it stays put and doesn't smear! Wonderful! I wanted to try the "burgundy" stick and it was hard to find in other brands. It really makes my blue eyes pop. Love it! I feel sorry for everyone who threw out their sticks thinking there wasn't any eye liner left. You simply have to twist the plastic container holding the stick. I had to twist it several times, but the eye liner does advance. Just be patient and use your noodle, folks.
customer_reviews.author: TheSpicyKraut

customer_reviews.title: ... used stila products before so I was a bit disappointed when I used this product
customer_reviews.text: I've used stila products before so I was a bit disappointed when I used this product. It smudges and runs easily and it's also harder to remove. I usually order the liquid liner from stila and I even purposely used one eye with the liquid stick and the other with the smudge stick. The liquid liner is much better in terms of staying longer, doesn't run like the smudge stick and it is easier to remove. So I basically wasted $22 because now I can't return the product since I used it and threw out the box already. I just re-ordered the liquid liner so I'm sticking to that one from now on.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Some Good, Some Awful
customer_reviews.text: Have not had any problem with the Purple Tang or Intense Black, but the Black Amethyst went in the trash. Within a couple of hours of applying that color, my eyes would turn red and start oozing matter. This would last for about 24 hours even after much rinsing with water. The first time it happened, I thought I had just had an unexpected allergy attack, even though I couldn't figure out what caused it. When I used that color for the second time a few days later and it happened again, I suspected it must be the eyeliner. Not sure if it is an ingredient in it causing an allergic reaction or an irritant in the material itself.
customer_reviews.author: CHR

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed enough to write a review
customer_reviews.text: Bummed out because it’s pricier than some others for the average buyer, so I expected it to work well. However I’ve had cheap drugstore brands that applied better, honestly. This product doesn’t go on well, you have to go over it multiple times to get it to a decently dark line. It’s not very smooth or precise at all. It also doesn’t advance but may self adjusting. I’m not sure I’ll use it long enough to find out!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product but defective
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product for years and love the color, smudge proof, and resistance to water! But this is the 2nd time returning it crack to amazon after the stick was delivered broken and falls right out. Trying it one more time because I love the convenience but if defective I will go back to buying it only from the store.
customer_reviews.author: Mr Oppenhuizen

customer_reviews.title: Great product, BUT.....
customer_reviews.text: I love the way this liner glides on. It's easy to apply and easy to correct if you make a mistake. The thing I do not like is it does not last very long, pretty pricey for a product that is gone in a very short time. And, I do not use it everyday, when I do use it I apply it sparingly. I prefer a more subtle look so I use very little when I do use it.
customer_reviews.author: katpow

customer_reviews.title: Great waterproof eyeliner
customer_reviews.text: I decided to look for a waterproof eyeliner because my allergies are so bad and I kept wiping off my eyeliner during the day while trying to keep my eyes dry. Plus, I was getting ready for a trip that would take me to a very humid climate and I still wanted to wear eyeliner while looking like a sweaty mess. Stila produces some great cosmetics and I decided to give this one a try. It works perfectly. It goes on smooth and wet, allowing you to manipulate and fix smudges as needed, then it dries and will not come off until you use makeup remover. It lasts through sweat, watery eyes, and rain.
customer_reviews.author: April in California

customer_reviews.title: I will buy again
customer_reviews.text: Wow, this product glides on super easy!! I am 63, so the eye area is fragile. No tugging, no pulling. Simple and precise. I did not rate this pencil for "water resistance" because I did not wear it in the water. Love it! I will buy in other colors.
customer_reviews.author: RobiM

customer_reviews.title: Best eye liner EVER ! Deep Burgundy
customer_reviews.text: I have tried a kazillion eyeliners over the past 50 years...from drug store brands to high end brands. This eyeliner glides on easily and lasts all day through you-name-it - - - oily lids, tears, sweat. It's amazing stuff ! /// I bought the deep burgundy to set off my hazel eyes. (also great for blue or green eyes) It's dark enough to look like regular eyeliner, but somehow not as harsh/hard looking as black and black-brown.
customer_reviews.author: Kay

customer_reviews.title: Unfortunate fluke or ripoff
customer_reviews.text: I love this eyeliner and was excited to see Amazon sold it, because my Ulta is always out of my favorite color it seems like. But, I’ve bought this twice now and both times the only actual eyeliner was the little pointy nub originally sticking out. There is no more than a few centimeters of eyeliner in this whole tube. Not interested in paying over $20 for three applications. Don’t know if this is a fluke or what, but very frustrating.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa Smith

customer_reviews.title: Not as Espected
customer_reviews.text: There was a stilla product, medium gray, some sparkle. Apparently it's not available anymore. This eyeliner was dry, stiff, and darker than expected.
customer_reviews.author: Doogiesmom

customer_reviews.title: Broke after second use
customer_reviews.text: The eyeliner was very dry and broke down inside the roll-up tube and fell to the ground after the second time I used it. It probably broke because I had a press so hard because it was so dry instead of being moist. It was a total waste of my money. I was on a trip so I didn’t get around to getting my money back for it. I forgot about it and when I remembered it was just too late.
customer_reviews.author: Ginny F.

customer_reviews.title: Dried out
customer_reviews.text: I always love this eyeliner and I usually buy it from Ulta. I bought it from Amazon on Prime Day bc it was on sale and it's a total waste of money. It's dried out and I'm going to throw it away bc it hurts too much to apply. Typically I love this eyeliner bc it goes on smooth and stays on all day--but don't buy it from this shop!!!
customer_reviews.author: Alissa Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Better than many
customer_reviews.text: This is better than many I have tried...it definitely smudges...easily and I'm not so sure how waterproof it is...I do like how smoothly it goes on and I like that it doesn't need sharpening
customer_reviews.author: SavedByGrace

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love Stila's eyeliner
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love Stila's eyeliner. I first bought their liquid eyeliner and fell in love, so I thought I'd try this one and I'm not disappointed at all. When you're applying it, it's super easy to remove in case you've made a mistake (as I often do), but once it sets it really stays on for a long time. It's also waterproof, which is really something that caught my attention, as theres nothing worse than sweating off eyeliner. This stick is super smooth and applies easily. I got the stick in espresso, which I thought would be a little darker than the color that came, but it still looks wonderful.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Heres

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful purple brown
customer_reviews.text: The eyeliner went on smoothly, with very little drag. The line is buildable, but can be quite fine. It's a very nice neutral color for day or night. It lasted all day and thru NYE, only under eye smudged down a bit. It takes makeup remover to remove it. I recommend highly. It works well with neutrals and purples.
customer_reviews.author: Angela - Witchyvampirate

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work on waterline
customer_reviews.text: I read that this was a geat pencil for the waterline, well I was excited to see if it would go on easy and stay. It didn’t even shoe up. I dried my inner ilids and did it professionally and it DIDN’T EVEN SHOW UP! Tried going over again and again! Don’t buy for the waterline!
customer_reviews.author: Sophie

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price!
customer_reviews.text: I continue to buy this eyeliner over and over! Stingray has been my color of choice but I am starting to try out other colors too now. I love this eyeliner, it looks great and I almost never need to reapply during the day!
customer_reviews.author: J.Trumpp

customer_reviews.title: Not a lot of pencil in this eye pencil
customer_reviews.text: I love this eyeliner but it doesn’t advance when turned, so it seems a bit expensive for something I can only use for two weeks or so.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Nope.  Don’t waste your money.  NOPE
customer_reviews.text: So NOT happy with this. I use the Stila eye pencils...but this hardly deposits any color at all on my eyelid. Made me furious to pay so much and it do no better than that. Can’t mail back b/c of Covid. Do not go into any buildings. Sucks.
customer_reviews.author: Deb

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: I have never had a reaction to make up or other body products, and this is the first product I’ve ever had issues with. Ever time I use it it makes my eyes hurt and today, I decided to wear it for a day long trip, and my eyes started to create discharge start to burn. The photos aren’t clear, but under my eye is now very puffy. Do not buy make up from Amazon, I’ve learned my lesson.
customer_reviews.author: Dana Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Broken when received
customer_reviews.text: This is the second smudge stick I’ve bought and both have been broken when I got them. I can only use a tiny bit before they’re useless. Very disappointing. Especially for the price.
customer_reviews.author: kurthk

customer_reviews.title: Ridiculously expensive
customer_reviews.text: I was expecting more for an eyeliner that’s over 20+ dollars while the color is simply gorgeous the price point is ridiculous and I will not buy it again there are other dupes available that I will buy instead
customer_reviews.author: Francesca.fit

customer_reviews.title: Good product, color not as expected.
customer_reviews.text: Nice product.... this was my first purchase. I’m a blonde, use mid tone brown for liner and lashes. Selected Lionfish color...was surprised that it has a very coppery look. I prefer subtle color around my eyes... not sparkly/shiny products...
customer_reviews.author: Robin Waters

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Never buying makup from amazon! It is never fresh! Not soft and does not glide easily!
customer_reviews.author: john causey

customer_reviews.title: good; try it
customer_reviews.text: i like this a lot. i tried the liquid eye liner first (for upper lid); i had been using Chanel. But this brand is less expensive and equally as good. this eye liner goes on smooothly; easy. stays on pretty well. I wear glasses so without them on i use a 10X mirror -- so it helps that this goes on easily. saving me some money, as just as good as more expensive brands, it not better.
customer_reviews.author: R BTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: favorite go to color
customer_reviews.text: I have been wearing eyeliner a long time (to long to say) but this particular color is beautiful - dark blue with a metallic shimmer. it's no longer available at most Ulta or Sephora stores, so this is a definite Amazon buy
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn A. Hosler

customer_reviews.title: Not that great
customer_reviews.text: First of all, it was not waterproof, second of all the color was not black, it left more of like a grayish color on my skin, & third the part of the pencil that's suppose to bring up more product didn't work, so I was stuck with the small amount of product at the top. Needless to say I was not pleased with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Julissa

customer_reviews.title: Do Not Purchase
customer_reviews.text: Do Not Buy! This product is not an authentic stila product. I’ve used this eyeliner for years (from Ulta) but recently started ordering it online from amazon. They are not the same! I have bought 2 of them, returned 1 and got a replacement. All were broken when they arrived and they continue to fall out. It is not the same either. It does not go on well or smooth and is terrible. Do not buy this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: stays put - goes on smoothly
customer_reviews.text: I love this eyeliner. It goes on smoothly (I have large, soft eyelids so other brands would skip) and does not smudge. I have not tried it around water yet, but it seems pretty reliable. It is also easy to use and I prefer a very fine line which is easily accomplished with this tip.
customer_reviews.author: Mel Q.

customer_reviews.title: Big fan !!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this liner so much!!! I’m an eye liner girl. Feel naked without it. Goes on super smooth the crayon does not break like drugstore brands. Last without smearing. Big Fan of this liner!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Slides on so easily
customer_reviews.text: This is my most favorite eye liner ever. Damsel is a nice, natural brown color. Even better, the smudge stick goes on without a lot of pressure and can easily wipe away if you mess up, or blend if you want a more natural look. I even bought it for my mom, and now she loves it! We have both used more expensive liners and brands, and none of them compare to this one.
customer_reviews.author: C. TaylorTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Very good eyeliner. ONly complaint is that it doesn't totally ...
customer_reviews.text: Very good eyeliner. ONly complaint is that it doesn't totally stay put during the day (some darkness shows up under the eye that needs to be wiped)
customer_reviews.author: St. A.

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good, did not cause any irritation.
customer_reviews.text: Decent amount of color, smooth application. But you still need a good primer/base (esp if you have oily lids) for it to last throughout the day. (I still needed to touch-up occasionally.) I have sensitive eyes and this liner did not cause me any irritation (however I do not line the inner rims of my eyes, I keep the liner just on the outside [along the lash line] and do a subtle cat-eye.)
customer_reviews.author: Luna

customer_reviews.title: Might as well be Crayola
customer_reviews.text: Was expecting a creamier pencil, one that glides on. This might as well be a Crayola. The color is lovely on my hand. Very difficult to apply. Forget using at waterline. Expected more for a Stila product priced over $20.
customer_reviews.author: mozelle58

customer_reviews.title: Horrible product
customer_reviews.text: This came and would not work. Would not roll up . After finally opening up the whole pencil to make it work. While applying it breaks. Definitely not recommend buying. Horrible product
customer_reviews.author: VICKY

customer_reviews.title: Total Fail
customer_reviews.text: Wanted to love this but the packaging is total crap. The twist-up mechanism broke after the first use so I basically paid for less than a millimeter of product. Sephora brand has a comparable eyeliner that also has a smudge-sponge on the other end. Same consistency and glide, but slightly less comprehensive color collection. If you're going for blacks and browns just get the sephora waterproof retractable eyeliner.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Won't twist up for use
customer_reviews.text: I like this brand because it lasts all day. I did not like that it won't twist up so you can't use it.
customer_reviews.author: Alycia

customer_reviews.title: My favorite eyeliner
customer_reviews.text: I’m not usually a fan of waterproof mascara or eyeliner just because I feel like it’s very drying and difficult to take off. This is very smooth; glides on nicely. Lion fish color has subtle sparkle to it, which I love. Washes off without a struggle. I’ve used this for years and still love it.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: I believe this is not an actual Stila product - inferior quality
customer_reviews.text: I agree with another reviewer who said this is a fake product - not actually Stila. I would not have noticed except that after a few months the stick no longer glides on - it's now all lumpy and really not usable. This caused me to look back at reviews and look at the product more closely. The missing stars on the label confirm for me that this is not the real deal. With the real Stila product, the stick remains smooth and glides on regardless of how long you keep it.
customer_reviews.author: Spencer Stevenson

customer_reviews.title: Water Proff and Fab
customer_reviews.text: The waterproof version has a small blue band on the cap (I ordered by accident), but, it is really a great product. It stayed on well but more importantly (to me) it applied easily, just like the other version. Comes off with eye make up remover wipes. The regular version can come off with just facial soap.
customer_reviews.author: Melinda Safrany

customer_reviews.title: 2nd defective item returned
customer_reviews.text: I purchased Stingray waterproof liner a few weeks ago- it did not twist up more liner, so I began return process, by ordering another one. To my dismay, same problem with the second one. Am returning both.
customer_reviews.author: Anita Alexander

customer_reviews.title: My favorite it doesn't smudge
customer_reviews.text: No melt and no smudge. Im in love. Doesn't irritate my eyes. Im so so happy.
customer_reviews.author: tylene fowler

customer_reviews.title: Stays on all day!
customer_reviews.text: Great eyeliner! Stays on all day and ir does not smudge.
customer_reviews.author: Eduardo Aramayo

customer_reviews.title: NOT FOR CONTACT LENS WEARERS
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, I did not listen to the other reviewer's who wear contacts. YOU CANNOT WEAR CONTACTS WITH THIS PRODUCT. IT IMMEDIATELY CLOUDS YOUR CONTACTS AND THEN THEY ARE UNWEARABLE. Plus the product irritated my eyes (slight burning, watering).
customer_reviews.author: Christie Buckingham

customer_reviews.title: Love that It is smudge type. So easy. So perfect
customer_reviews.text: The smudgs tip is just right. Not too thick Or too thin. Gives you excellent control And isn’t so juicy too miluch comes out. No more need for Q-tips to wipe away Excess!
customer_reviews.author: Deb Lindstrom

customer_reviews.title: Defective packaging.
customer_reviews.text: The twisty part was broken and when I tried to turn it the “Tube” of eyeliner came out and half of it is wasted and crumbled.
customer_reviews.author: Marla L. Fasano

customer_reviews.title: The best
customer_reviews.text: I have very sensitive skin and this is only product at spf 50 level that I can tolerate and it doesn't mess with my skin. It's light, and not greasy at all with no fragrance! It has good for you properties in there so it's perfect for me. Normally I purchase it via the FSA store so I can use my FSA funds directly, however they've been sold out there.
customer_reviews.author: JDJA

customer_reviews.title: Product was already used and gone!
customer_reviews.text: I just opened my eyeliner to find that it had already been used up by somebody else!
customer_reviews.author: michelle

customer_reviews.title: A disappointment
customer_reviews.text: The color was nice and I like the crayon-type eyeliners, so I had high hopes that this would be a lower-cost alternative to my favorite Dior eyeliner. But while this claims to be waterproof I still ended up with smudges and dark circles under my eyes. The pencil also tended to crumble. Disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: B. Horrigan

customer_reviews.title: magical dissapearing eyeliner
customer_reviews.text: I am pretty loyal to Stila products, but I'm dissapointed with this eyeliner. It is *gone* by the end of my work day. I am not one to bring a bunch of makeup to work with me so I like staying power. Also, you have to twist this thing like crazy to get more out. I ended up ordering a replacement because I thought mine was broken. Nope, and now I have 2. The brown color, however, is very pretty, just the right amount of warmth for my olive skin and the shimmer is perfect. I just wish it would stay on!
customer_reviews.author: Breanna

customer_reviews.title: Can't get more product out. Eyeliner stuck inside.
customer_reviews.text: I used the eyeliner just a couple of times and loved it but when I turned the top to get more out, it would not turn. I can't seem to get more eyeliner out of the tube. I'm really bummed because I love the eyeliner but I can't get more product out and will only now have less than 5 uses out of it.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa

customer_reviews.title: I bought this eyeliner and was so excited to get ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this eyeliner and was so excited to get it. When I finally did I tried it and it lasted all day but it did run off a little bit. So the following day I wanted to put it on but couldn't. I tried to make the lead come out more and it didn't happen. It was defective. So I returned it for another one. The second one came today and I just tried to twist the lead up and had the same problem. I am returning it for a refund. I will buy this product ever again.
customer_reviews.author: Virginia N.

customer_reviews.title: Smoother application and fresh from supplier
customer_reviews.text: I love the Stila eyeliners, but buying online can be tricky. This order came in wonderfully - eye liner was fresh and not hard. I have had orders from other suppliers where the eyeliner was too hard to apply, but this supplier's product was nice
customer_reviews.author: Hapnlisa

customer_reviews.title: Broken, only 5 uses
customer_reviews.text: This is broken, same problem as others report. Turning the tube does not advance the eyeliner. I only got 5 uses out of a $20 eyeliner stick! It's a fine eyeliner, but broken products are not OK
customer_reviews.author: G Hiles

customer_reviews.title: I love this product, but it ran out in only 2 weeks!!!
customer_reviews.text: I wonder if I got a used liner by mistake since it ran out so quickly?? The seller was very quick to apologize. I am returning it at the seller's expense, and they quickly notified me they would send me a replacement and upgrade to 2 days shipping, so that makes me happy. As long as the seller makes good, I'm good. I just hope the replacement liner lasts more than 2 weeks. I will tell you that this product goes on very nicely and stays on. I always had problems with other liners that don't stay on, but this one does its job!
customer_reviews.author: Squirrelly girl

customer_reviews.title: Expired old Stila being FALSELY sold as new and fresh
customer_reviews.text: The REAL thing is awesome. Stila no longer makes this color so all the ones I ordered have been old and dried up. They are expired. Not happy.
customer_reviews.author: susi

customer_reviews.title: Good color and application; but irritating for me personally
customer_reviews.text: Product color and application are fine; however, at least for me, it seems to be irritating to my eyes, so I have stopped using it.
customer_reviews.author: Frankincense

customer_reviews.title: Beware!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I used this once and it won’t twist up. So basically I’m down to the nub after one use!!! This is some kind of scam. I paid $20 to use this once.
customer_reviews.author: crystal magouirk

customer_reviews.title: Not Stila
customer_reviews.text: Knock off and was dried out. Didn’t have the Stila pop. Useless and waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The tip has broken off a couple of times but it’s still a great product
customer_reviews.text: The tip has broken off a couple of times but it’s still a great product
customer_reviews.author: -=LmS=-

customer_reviews.title: It keeps smudging
customer_reviews.text: Bought it because I must have oily eyelids because liners smudge. So I bought this because it’s smudge proof - but it still smudges, like 2 seconds after I put it on. I even use primer first. Still looking for the perfect pencil liner.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. MamaBearz

customer_reviews.title: Too expensive!
customer_reviews.text: It may go on smoothly and last but when I turned the pencil to get a longer tip, I discovered there was no more. This was just too expensive for what little liner you get.
customer_reviews.author: Verified customer

customer_reviews.title: Stays put and stays bold
customer_reviews.text: I have this in brown it’s nice and soft and stays all day without smudging
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Favorite eyeliner!!
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite eyeliner. Goes on smooth and stays all day.
customer_reviews.author: MCF

customer_reviews.title: good buy
customer_reviews.text: This eyeliner ROCKS!! It is the perfect shade of brown. It makes my eyes pop. I use this liner on my eyelids only. I put it on once in the morning before work at like 7am and then if I go out to dinner I will apply again at like 6. The brown is a little sparkly, but it doesn't put sparkles on my face or anything and I can only see that if I am up close to a mirror. This is a fantastic eyeliner. It lasted me 7 months..now that is awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Hannah H.

customer_reviews.title: My favorite eyeliner!
customer_reviews.text: Best eyeliner I have ever used. A bit higher priced but since it's easier to apply and stays on longer, it is worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Cat

customer_reviews.title: meh.
customer_reviews.text: It's alright, it goes on nice and blah blah blah, but I would not say it's waterproof. and especially for 22 dollars, ya, try something else. I'd give an idea, but I haven't found anything worth mentioning yet.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Williams

customer_reviews.title: Dry and does not glide on
customer_reviews.text: Have had before but this one does not glide on. Feel like I’m pulling to hard on eyelid to get any color. Disappointed as does not seem same quality as store.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie B

customer_reviews.title: Long lasting
customer_reviews.text: Stays on all day! I used to use Avon, but they changed the formula me my eyeliner would be gone by 10 am. This is an excellent, if more expensive, substitute.
customer_reviews.author: Christine P.

customer_reviews.title: Subpar
customer_reviews.text: For such a pricey name brand, this eyeliner is subpar. Had better luck with wet-n-wild!
customer_reviews.author: Keenly Peach

customer_reviews.title: This was OK but I found a product that works better
customer_reviews.text: This worked OK-ish I did find a new product that works better
customer_reviews.author: Wicked Salsa

customer_reviews.title: Stila smudge stick black
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product first in lionfish (brown) and had no problems with it. Glides on smoothly and stays put (with primer). However, when I applied the black, within 2 hours the top liner had smudged into the crease of my eyelids, giving that lovely raccoon look, despite having applied a good eyelid primer first. Granted, I do have oily eyelids, but never having been able to wear black liner before because of this, I had higher hopes for this product.
customer_reviews.author: SCT93

customer_reviews.title: I love this product and I can't replace this with anything ...
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for an eyeliner that it doesn't smudge and stays for at least 8 hours. And there I found it! I thought the waterproof LIQUID eyeliner would do the job but it didn't. This product performs as you expect! I love this product and I can't replace this with anything else!
customer_reviews.author: Yukoliesh

customer_reviews.title: The best eye liner we've ever used
customer_reviews.text: The best eye liner we've ever used. It's a little pricey but so worth it! My daughter does competitive dance, and this is the only make-up product we don't have to worry about having to reapply throughout the day.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Bateman

customer_reviews.title: Pretty and worth the cost.
customer_reviews.text: This is long-lasting while being soft and easy to put on. Love Stila and their colors. Great quality on these.
customer_reviews.author: C. Davis

customer_reviews.title: Not happy!!
customer_reviews.text: I used the eyeliner 2 times and it wouldn’t roll up anymore to use. Therefore, I got 2 uses out of it. Not happy!!!
customer_reviews.author: Heather G.

customer_reviews.title: Won't twist up.
customer_reviews.text: When I twist to get more it won't advance anymore of it. That means you only get a tiny bit of it and the rest is wasted. Would like a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Experiencing Life

customer_reviews.title: Great product!!  Goes on very smooth!!
customer_reviews.text: I was originally shopping for a different brand of eye liner; however, it was not available on Prime. I decided to give this one a try. So happy I did!! It goes on so easily and smooth! The first time I used it, I got a little carried away because I was not expecting it to go on the way it did. This is without a doubt, my new eye liner!
customer_reviews.author: J. Werkele

customer_reviews.title: Great for the absolute novice
customer_reviews.text: I basically put on eyeliner and concealer if needed each day and prize ease of application and non-smudge. This has been the easiest to use and the least smudgy after ~5 years of experimenting with drugstore and premium brands. It lasts maybe 2 months each use. Which doesn’t seem a lot to me but then I’m not an expert.
customer_reviews.author: GJ

customer_reviews.title: Stays put all day!
customer_reviews.text: This color looks great with green eyes! I cannot believe how it makes my eyes really pop. It goes on smooth, like velvet and stays put all day long. I work 11 hour days and never need to reapply!
customer_reviews.author: Cat D

customer_reviews.title: Definitely a fake product.
customer_reviews.text: This is definitely a fake product! There was no liner left after 2 uses. I couldn’t advance the stick at all.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonaddict

customer_reviews.title: Lives up to the hype
customer_reviews.text: The best black eyeliner ever. Goes on super smooth and super easy. Small point so you can get precise lines and lasts all day and night without smudging.
customer_reviews.author: Sturgis

customer_reviews.title: Could be over rated
customer_reviews.text: Not sure how I feel about Stila eye liner. I think it's a little over rated. but, I will continue to use it to see if it stays on longer and is water resistant as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Pat W.

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: This product is not worth the price! It smudges all over the eye and is a piece of crap
customer_reviews.author: basya woonteiler

customer_reviews.title: Love this color!
customer_reviews.text: This is the first time using Stila. I bought it in "Tetra" color and loved the smooth application &the fact that it's waterproof. (Yep, tried to remove makeup without specific clean up tools & this looked like I just applied it!) "Tetra" is a deep plum mixed with a slate or charcoal. Very pretty.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Not quite the color I expected
customer_reviews.text: I was expecting a more gray shade, but instead it is almost black. It does stay on all day, but smeary if you don't get it in the right place.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: Love how easy it goes on. How easy it is to blend. And seems to stay put. Will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Tarra Holifield

customer_reviews.title: you always think it's going to look like it on you
customer_reviews.text: When you see it on someone else, you always think it's going to look like it on you. However, you have to remember that isn't the case! I feel like this is a good product, but I just need to be super careful while putting it on. It seems super delicate that the tip will always break. And, it did at first.
customer_reviews.author: Ellie's Mom

customer_reviews.title: Good Color - Bad Mechanis
customer_reviews.text: The color was great, but the mechanics did not work & the product would not swivel up/out so that the stick could be used. Amazon was great in return/refund (thanks!).
customer_reviews.author: D Cullen

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I'm assuming this one may have been old. I normally purchase it from Ulta and always satisfied. Could not get this on at all. I'll make the trip to the store next time.
customer_reviews.author: Erin Hill

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this!!! It's the best NON-SMUDGE!!!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a good non-smudge eye liner. I went into Sephora at the mall and an attendant showed me a couple. We drew on her hand and mine with a few different ones. We gave them just a second to dry and then tried to wipe them off. This one doesn't MOVE. It's wonderful to not worry about crease lines and such when you are working a long day.
customer_reviews.author: KRO :)

customer_reviews.title: easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Love how easy it goes on and lasts most of the day
customer_reviews.author: GIGS

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: This eyeliner does not flow smoothly. Bythe time you get some color on your eye, you've rubbed half your skin off trying to get it to color in.
customer_reviews.author: Cyn

product_meta.title: stila Smudge Stick Waterproof Eye Liner
product_meta.description: Color:STINGRAYOur bestselling Smudge Sticks are now available in an array of matte, shimmer and pop hues that hold tight. Made with a cocktail of moisturizing ingredients, including vitamin E, color glides on smooth (no tugging or pulling) in a waterproof formula that won't budge or fade. With tons of gorgeous shades to pick from, discover intense and immediate color payoff in a single swipe! Our Smudge Sticks pack a one-two punch: you can use it as a classic pencil liner or a smudgy eye shadow - simply smudge with your fingers or a brush before color sets. Tips - For best use, remove the cap, twist counterclockwise multiple times (it may take several twists),and apply.The propel pencil does not retract

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
